text: The 2018 Bataan Risers season is the 1st season of the franchise in the Maharlika Pilipinas Basketball League (MPBL). ==Key dates== * January 25, 2018: Inaugural season of the Maharlika Pilipinas Basketball League (MPBL). ==Names== * Bataan Defenders (2018) * Bataan Risers (2018–present) ==Roster== ==Rajah Cup== ===Eliminations=== ====Standings==== ====Game log==== |-
